skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cpi
des:
Don't want to get up from the middle of a movie but you're not sure if you locked the front door? Ask CPI to lock the front door. A little hot or too cold, ask CPI to set the living room to heat or AC mode. Whatever the scenario, the CPI skill adds convenience to monitoring and controlling your system. 

Here are a few examples of other commands (start with "Alexa, ask CPI..."): 

Security
"...is my security system (dis)armed?" 
"...to arm stay my security system."

Access
"...is the garage door open?"
"...to close the garage door."
"...is the front door unlocked?"
"...to lock the front door." 

Video Monitoring
"...to record a clip with the living room camera."
"...to pan the living room camera to the couch."

Thermostat
"...what is the temperature? 
"...to set the living room to AC mode."
"...to set the kitchen thermostat to 72 degrees."

Lights
"...to turn the kitchen light on."
"...to set the living room light to 20%."
"...to turn off the lights."

Is the skill having trouble picking up some of your devices? Try changing the name of your equipment to something more common or check your equipment name for spelling errors. 

Before using this skill, you will need your CPI Security inTouch username and password to link your CPI Security inTouch account with Alexa. Please note that the CPI skill only works for customers who have integrated systems powered by Alarm.com.a
